actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an alternative exclusion for nonresident citizens of the United States living abroad.
short_title: Tax Fairness for Americans Abroad Act of 2018

summary.text:
Tax Fairness for Americans Abroad Act of 2018 

This bill allow certain U.S. citizens who are residents of foreign countries to elect to use an alternative tax exclusion for foreign source income, which expands the foreign source income that may be excluded from gross income for tax purposes.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an alternative exclusion for nonresident citizens of the United States living abroad.
